Package shadowman.filter.update

Interface Summary
StatementDistributionLoader<I,O> Service interface defining StatementDistribution mechanism
StatementDistributionUpdatePolicy<T> Policy interface to capture the details of whether an update to a local distribution should occur
 

Class Summary
HttpStatementDistributionDownloadService Implementation of StatementDistributionLoader utilizing HttpClient which will initiate an HTTPS request per the specified StatementDistributionContentExchange.
PolicyDrivenStatementDistributionUpdateService StatementDistributionUpdateService implementation which conditionally pulls StatementDistribution updates from the specified target URI via the specified HttpStatementDistributionDownloadService and updates the StatementDistributionReaderFactory for the specified Member
RateOfChangeStatementDistributionUpdatePolicy Implementation of a StatementDistributionUpdatePolicy which considers the rate of change identified by the incoming message and will result in a true value if the rate of change specified by the message falls within the configured range.
StatementDistributionContentExchange ContentExchange implementation to facilitate the retrieval of StatementDistribution.
StatementDistributionUpdateService<S,T> Service interface defining update mechanism of a StatementDistribution from the targeted Member
StaticUpdateStatementDistributionUpdatePolicy StatementDistributionUpdatePolicy implementation which will always respond to StatementDistributionUpdatePolicy.isSatisfied(Object) as specified via StaticUpdateStatementDistributionUpdatePolicy.StaticUpdateStatementDistributionUpdatePolicy(boolean)
